snippet: The University of Missouri-St. Louis on Wednesday announced a hiring freeze in response to an unexpected enrollment drop that campus officials are linking to the fatal police shooting in nearby Ferguson.
abstract: University of Missouri-St Louis announces hiring freeze in response to an unexpected enrollment drop that campus officials are linking to fatal police shooting in nearby Ferguson.
lead_paragraph: The University of Missouri-St. Louis on Wednesday announced a hiring freeze in response to an unexpected enrollment drop that campus officials are linking to the fatal police shooting in nearby Ferguson.

headline.main: Missouri: University Ties Drop in Students to Ferguson
headline.print_headline: Missouri: University Ties Decrease in Student Enrollment to Ferguson
